entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
